parsing_result:
# Editing the Quick Menu

To choose the items displayed in the quick menu:

1. Press and hold the **Q** button during shooting.  
   Photo or movie **EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU** options will be displayed.

   !Q Button

2. Highlight the item currently in the position you wish to edit and press **MENU/OK**.

3. Highlight the desired item and press **MENU/OK** to assign it to the selected position.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The quick menus can also be edited using **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING** > **EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU** or **EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU**.
